jcolibri.cbrcase
Class CBRCaseRecord

java.lang.Object
  jcolibri.cbrcase.SimpleIndividual
      jcolibri.cbrcase.CBRCaseRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
CBRCase, CBRQuery, Individual, CBRTerm
public class CBRCaseRecord
extends SimpleIndividual
implements CBRCase

Simple attribute-value CBRCase strucutre. Although a simple structure the values for the attribute will remain trated as Individual.

addAttribute

public void addAttribute(java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.Object value,
                         double weight,
                         java.lang.String attributeType)
Adds a new attribute to this case if doesn't exist yet.

Parameters:
description - Name/description of the new attribute
value - Value for the new attribute
weight - Importance indication of this attribute in the whole case.
attributeType - Type of attribute. Not used, mantained here for backwards compatibility.
